EmailTemplate.name: 202009_EMEAI_FGI_List_of_Discounted_Parts_MC.202009_EMEAI_FGI&SPEX_List_of_Disco
EmailTemplate.subject: List of marked down parts is available for download
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in the Honeywell Discounted Spares Sale.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Honeywell_Discounted Parts_New %26 Used.xlsx]]> to access the list of discounted parts. Please note that this is a limited period offer and parts are subject to availability, on a first come, first serve basis, on new orders only.
We will contact you soon, so please have your list of required parts ready.
Further to our spares sale, you may be interested to know more about:Â
- Honeywell UV Cabin System - a portable Ultraviolet-C solution for a cleaner cabin. Click here <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/mvHYbfyxdxf2KcUV493W3C?utm_source=email&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=20_emeai_atr_hat&utm_content=linkedin-nurture-email]]> to watch our informative webinar or visit our product page <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/products/cabin/uv-cabin-system?utm_source=email&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=20_emeai_atr_hat&utm_content=linkedin-nurture-email]]> for details - Special trade-in price to upgrade to smaller, lighter and safer ELTs. Click here <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/tGX0200vQ00qJ00ZI0000VH]]> for offer details.
